title: Health Department
cleaned_text: - Herb Conaway, MD Director [Email](mailto:bchd@co.burlington.nj.us) Health Department Raphael Meadow Health Center 15 Pioneer Blvd. Westampton, NJ 08060 [Map](https://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&georestrict=input_srcid:0b67f435e9f0f31f&ie=UTF8&view=map&cid=16852486984521483358&q=Burlington+County+Health+Department&hq=Burlington+County+Health+Department&hnear=&t=h&vpsrc=6&ll=40.017065,-74.816422&spn=0.007888,0.013733&z=16&iwloc=A&source=embed) 609-265-5548 Fax: 609-265-3152 To contact the Health Department after hours and on holidays contact Burlington County Central Communications at 609-267-8300 Communicable Disease Clinic Hours Sexually Transmitted Disease (STD) Testing & HIV Testing Tuesday 3 p.m.-4:30 p.m. Wednesday 5 p.m.-6:30 p.m. Thursday 9 a.m. - 11:30 a.m.
